data.message: How can i verify facebook page, Please???

replies.message: Hey Hamza. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1UKEPww. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://on.fb.me/1R2xGbT. -Jordan

thanks a lot, i have second problem please, my Develop account is Suspended!, how can i cancel it??
thanks for help :)
